description: This file defines API routes using FastAPI for inference and streaming inference results related to claim verification. It includes route handlers that perform text sentencization, claim detection, search, scoring, and streaming of incremental inference results.

methods.name: InferenceResponse run_inference( payload: InferenceRequest, response: Response, user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
methods.description: Handles the POST request to run the claim inference pipeline on provided text, returning detected sentences, identified claims, and scoring results.

methods.name: stream_inference( payload: InferenceRequest, response: Response, user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
methods.description: Handles the POST request to stream incremental inference results, including sentences, evidence, scores, and completion status, as NDJSON stream.
